name: twitlytics-server
description: A simple NodeJS API which receives a t.co referrer link, and traces it back to the user and tweet.

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: The Consumer Key from your Twitter Application.

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: The Consumer Secret from your Twitter Application.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: The OAuth Access Token Key generated within your Twitter Application.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: The OAuth Access Token Secret generated within your Twitter Application.
